mapper.insert: insert into Book (book_id, title, ISBN, publisher_id, pub_date,genre_id, price, author, pages, size ) values (0, #{title}, #{ISBN}, #{publisherId}, #{pubDate},#{genreId}, #{price}, #{author}, #{pages}, #{size})
mapper.select: select b.* , p.name from Book b join publisher p on b.publisher_id = p.publisher_id where b.publisher_id = #{id} order by book_id
